name: C-RATS #04: Antarctica 198X
description:
The fourth entry of C-RATS (Conflicts : Regions, Antagonists, and Tactics, Summarized) which is my blatant rip-off of the excellent RATIONS entries created by Claymore and company, for use with the PbtA game of paranormal mercenaries and
tactical action, FIST.

C-RATS Type : Scenario
THEMES : Paranoia, Frontier Isolation
INSPIRATION : Social Media, John Carpenter's "The Thing", Anthony Powell's "Antarctica : A Year on the Ice", the state of the 2022 Libertarian Party (US)

A plea for rescue comes to FIST from a researcher at a remote Antarctica research station.  Everyone there has disappeared mysteriously, strange things are happening, and a malicious force lingers at the edge of the facility.

Can FIST rescue the survivor... or survivors?  How can they deal with a violent force they cannot see, psychotically toying with them, intent on their harm?

CW : Violence against animals, sudden danger, isolation, mental corruption.
